<h2>Treat yourself to an ultimate Floridian relaxation at a SPA getaway...</h2>
Our SPA &amp; skin care salon will be your perfect getaway for any kind of body and mind relaxation and a skin care...

It's been like that since the day 1, when our SPA salon was founded by Mary Fruition back in 1998.

She did so in a spur of a moment decision, after previously saving enough money working as a SPA salon senior manager in a prestigious North Carolina's hotel.

Since then we've been expanding our SPA salon's team, our list of skin care and relaxation-inducing services and our name recognition as well.

Just think of such a tempting delight as visiting our salon is. Skipping your daily routine just for a while, like an hour, an afternoon or an entire day of total personal pampering.

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="79" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="40" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_last_edited="on|desktop" height_phone="30"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h2>We're a #1 Orlando SPA for a number of reasons:</h2>
[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e85b" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Variety of Care" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/specialists/" module_class="float-xl-right icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="45" header_font_size_tablet="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

Our salon is unique among other Orlando SPAs, all thanks to an insurmountable variety of skin care and relaxation choices that we have...

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e85a" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Qualified Staff" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/" module_class="float-xl-left icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="45" header_font_size_tablet="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

All of the salon's staff members are perfectly qualified to get you relaxed &amp; cared for... That's all due to their immense talent and skills their hands have...

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e802" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Relaxation-centric" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/spa-skin-care/" module_class="float-xl-right icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="45" header_font_size_tablet="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

First and foremost, we're a relaxation getaway... With the help of our nurturing and skin health enhancing services you'll be feeling yourself just like in heaven!

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e854" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Reasonable costs" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/pricing/" module_class="float-xl-left icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="45" header_font_size_tablet="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80px" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="off" height_tablet="50" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#ffffff" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off" background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home08.jpg"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h2>Anyone who visits our SPA even once has
something nice to say...</h2>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="7" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="6" height_phone="5" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Rhode Gentlebear" url_new_window="off" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="center" portrait_border_radius="50%" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" custom_css_testimonial_description="max-width: 770px;||margin: auto;" font_icon="f10e" module_class="testimonial-text-center"]

Man rarely acknowledge how much they love to get a massage... But I want to say, that without my afterwork Friday massage sessions here, my productivity would've been so much lower...

[/tm_pb_testimonial][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="89" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#ffffff" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

[/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

<h2>Meet our SPA &amp; skin care salon's vast, friendly team of caring professionals!</h2>

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="on|phone"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

<p>
Since the first day in business, our SPA salon, our owner Mary and all of our big, friendly and caring team of professionals are here to ensure an absolutely unforgettable experience for each of our clients...</p>
<p>Always on the SPA industry's cutting edge, our SPA &amp; skin care salon offers each of our charming visitors a unique and extensive relaxation and skin care experience. This is guaranteed to be delivered by our vast and skilled team members, all of whom showcase the highest level of technical expertise and an impeccably high level of guest servicing...</p>
<p><strong>Our main work values are at the heart of everything we do here, keeping evert single procedure we do consistently useful, pleasant and upbeat!</strong></p>
<h4>We believe in being:</h4>
<ul>
<li>Caring for other People just as about ourselves...</li>
<li>Sincere, Helpful &amp; Respectful</li>
<li>Loving What We Do!</li>
<li>Fresh &amp; Relevant</li>
<li>Wary of Everyone's Beauty, Harmony &amp; Well-Being</li>
</ul>

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team04.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="left" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" module_class="img_add2" custom_margin_phone="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_image][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="on|phone"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#ffffff" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" saved_tabs="all"]

<hr class="dash" />

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

<h2>Meet our SPA &amp; skin care Team!</h2>

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="37" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="35" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|desktop"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" global_module="647" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" parallax_4="off" parallax_method_4="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member global_parent="647" admin_label="Person" name="Mary Fruition" position="Salon's owner" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team04.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/mary-fruition/"]

<p id="cache8"><span id="cache9">Before setting up her own salon, Mary's been working at a prestigious SPA venue in North Carolina...</span></p>
<p id="cache10"><span id="cache11">There she was able to save a sufficient amount of a principal capital in order to set up her very own SPA &amp; skin care salon in Orlando, Florida...&nbsp; </span></p>

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member global_parent="647" admin_label="Person" name="Emily Nichols" position="Senior SPA specialist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team02.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_phone="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/emily-nichols/"]

<p><span id="cache21">Emily's career as a SPA care specialist has spanned to include work at numerous prestigious salons across the US...But after moving with her family from the state of New York to Orlando, Florida, Emily have made a fortunate decision to become a part of our salon's team!</span></p>

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member global_parent="647" admin_label="Person" name="Stacy Blunt" position="Junior SPA specialist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team03.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_padding_tablet="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/stacy-blunt/"]

<p id="cache8"><span id="cache9">The reason why Stacy is so natural with everything regarding skin's health and skin care treatments may have to do with her prior medical degree...</span></p>
<p id="cache10"><span id="cache11">For a few years following her med school graduation she's been soul searching for a perfect job field, and thankfully she found one!</span></p>

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member global_parent="647" admin_label="Person" name="Danielle Johns" position="Junior SPA specialist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team05.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_tablet="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/danielle-johns/"]

<p id="cache9"><span id="cache10">Danielle has been working in a SPA industry well since she was 17... Her skills and her positive style of work have swiftly made her our leading specialist in the feet and hands treatment fields!</span></p>
<p id="cache11"><span id="cache12">Also, Danielle is the head of our SPA salon's Gentlemen's services department. </span></p>

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="94" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|desktop"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off" background_color="#fdfbf8"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_last_edited="on|desktop" height_phone="30"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

<h2>We're a #1 Orlando SPA for a number of reasons:</h2>

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e85b" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Variety of Care" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/specialists/" module_class="float-xl-right small-icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

<p>Our salon is unique among other Orlando's SPAs, all thanks to an insurmountable variety of skin care and relaxation choices that we have...</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e85a" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Handy Staff" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/" module_class="float-xl-left small-icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

<p>All of the salon's staff members are perfectly qualified to get you relaxed &amp; cared for... That's all due to their immense talent and skills their hands have...</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e802" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Relaxation-centric" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/spa-skin-care/" module_class="float-xl-right small-icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

<p>First and foremost, we're a relaxation getaway... With the help of our nurturing and skin's health enhancing services you'll be feeling yourself just like in heaven!</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e854" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Reasonable costs" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/pricing/" module_class="float-xl-left small-icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

<p>As opposed to other Orlando's or Florida's SPAs, we do not target people's wallets eagerly... Our prices' affordability goes intact with our services' quality!</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" global_module="253" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row global_parent="253" admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider global_parent="253" admin_label="Divider" color="#e0e0e8" show_divider="off" divider_style="solid" height_last_edited="off|"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_divider global_parent="253" admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="70" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="40" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|desktop"]

</p>

<h3>Emily Nichols</h3>
<h5>Senior SPA specialist</h5>
<div id="u166" class="text">
<div id="u166" class="text">

Emily's career as a SPA care specialist has spanned to include work at numerous prestigious salons across the US...

But after moving with her family from the state of New York to Orlando, Florida, Emily have made a fortunate decision to become a part of our salon's team!

Since then she's been a vital member of the staff, gaining wide recognition from our customers for her skills and a universal acclaim from all other SPA girls here.

Most of the time Emily provides services for body and face skin treatments.

On top of that, she's our top specialist, whose workflow coordination has proved to contribute a lot to our salon's success with the clients!

</div>
</div>

<h2>This specialist is available for these SPA procedures:</h2>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_section admin_label="section"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="on|desktop" saved_tabs="all"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team03.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="left" sticky="off" align="left" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_phone="||10px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" module_class="img_add"] [/tm_pb_image][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="2_3"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="20" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h3>Stacy Blunt</h3>
<h5>Junior SPA specialist</h5>
<div id="u166" class="text">
<div id="u166" class="text">
<div id="u166" class="text">

The reason why Stacy is so natural with everything regarding skin's health and skin care treatments may have to do with her prior medical degree...

For a few years following her med school graduation she's been soul searching for a perfect job field, and thankfully she found one!

Now, as a vital member of our SPA &amp; skin care salon's team, Stacy proves herself to be probably the best facial care specialist that we or anyone else in Florida have ever had...

All of our clients just love her positive attitude, skillful and tender style of work, which brings immediate results and her overall personality!

Currently, Stacy is our most overbooked specialist!

</div>
</div>
</div>

<h3>Danielle Johns</h3>
<h5>Junior SPA specialist</h5>
<div id="u166" class="text">
<div id="u166" class="text">
<div id="u166" class="text">

Danielle has been working in a SPA industry well since she was 17...

Her skills and her positive style of work have swiftly made her our leading specialist in the feet and hands treatment fields!

Her enthusiasm and her attitude have made her one of our most acclaimed specialists, while her previous practical experience of working as a manicure/pedicure specialist in a Boston-based SPA salon have surely contributed to her overall skill-set...

Also, Danielle is the head of our SPA salon's Gentlemen's services department.

That service is unique, as currently we're the only SPA facility in the whole of Orlando, Florida who did recognize the fact how fast SPAs' popularity grows among men...

</div>
</div>
</div>

<h3>Mary Fruition</h3>
<h5>Salon's owner</h5>
<div id="u166" class="text">

Before setting up her own salon, Mary's been working at a prestigious SPA venue in North Carolina...

There she was able to save a sufficient amount of a principal capital in order to set up her very own SPA &amp; skin care salon.

From those summer days of 1998 on, Mary's been instrumental in expanding absolutely every single aspect of the salon's features to its best:
<ul>
 	<li>The number of skin care &amp; SPA relaxation services has been drastically expanded</li>
 	<li>The team extended to include 12 more skin care professionals, all sincerely passionate about providing the ultimate SPA experience</li>
</ul>
...and so much more!

</div>
&nbsp;

	<item>
		<title>Spa &amp; Skin Care</title>
		<link>http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/spa-skin-care/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 21 Apr 2016 08:58:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/?page_id=298</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_section admin_label="section" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off" module_class="services-list"][tm_pb_row admin_label="row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="on|desktop" saved_tabs="all"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h2>Our SPA salon offers skin care services for any occasion out there, providing you with the ultimate experience and the utmost relaxation...</h2>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="42" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="35" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" parallax_4="off" parallax_method_4="off" column_padding_mobile="on" module_class="text-md-left flex-columns"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/services_waxing.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="center" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h4>Waxing</h4>
Waxing is a vital way to keep your skin elastic, clean and smooth... Our SPA &amp; skin care salon has always focused on providing an excellent experience for while doing that and we use only the best products for this...

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" height_tablet="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_button admin_label="Button" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/spa-skin-care/waxing/" url_new_window="off" button_text="read more" button_alignment="left" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="btn-offset-1"] [/tm_pb_button][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/services_facialCare.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="center" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h4>Facial care</h4>
While everyone knows, that having a regular facial skin care session is vital for keeping up with your health and keeping your look fresh and young, we know it better, than anybody else in Orlando!

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" height_tablet="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_button admin_label="Button" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/spa-skin-care/facial-care/" url_new_window="off" button_text="read more" button_alignment="left" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="btn-offset-1"] [/tm_pb_button][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/services_medi-spa.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="center" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h4>Medi-spa</h4>
Besides providing regular face &amp; body skin care and a range of other SPA services, we have a separate medical SPA range as well... These include chemical peeling, laser hair removal and many other services...

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" height_tablet="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_button admin_label="Button" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/spa-skin-care/medi-spa/" url_new_window="off" button_text="read more" button_alignment="left" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="btn-offset-1"] [/tm_pb_button][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/services_massage.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="center" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h4>Massages</h4>
Massages have always been a vital part of any essential SPA range of services... Besides providing a great stress relief and a profound level of relaxation for anyone, massages are also proven to be good for your health!

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" height_tablet="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_button admin_label="Button" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/spa-skin-care/massages/" url_new_window="off" button_text="read more" button_alignment="left" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="btn-offset-1"] [/tm_pb_button][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="23" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="20" height_phone="18" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" saved_tabs="all"]

<hr class="dash" />

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="43" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="40" height_phone="35" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="on|desktop" saved_tabs="all"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" parallax_4="off" parallax_method_4="off" column_padding_mobile="on" module_class="text-md-left flex-columns"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/services_bodyTreatments.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="center" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h4>Body treatments</h4>
<div id="u206" class="text">

Treating your body with care and love is an essential way to stay looking young, to keep your skin radiantly fresh and healthy...

Our cosmetologists and aestheticians will be helping you in achieving that!

</div>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" height_tablet="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_button admin_label="Button" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/spa-skin-care/body-treatments/" url_new_window="off" button_text="read more" button_alignment="left" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="btn-offset-1"] [/tm_pb_button][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/services_pedicure.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="center" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h4>Feet treatments/pedicure</h4>
Taking a good care of your feet and nails is essential. Our vast team of cosmetologists and aestheticians will provide an ultimate, SPA-induced services for refreshing your health and enhancing the overall aesthetic look...

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" height_tablet="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_button admin_label="Button" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/spa-skin-care/feet-treatmentspedicure/" url_new_window="off" button_text="read more" button_alignment="left" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="btn-offset-1"] [/tm_pb_button][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/services_manicure.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="center" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h4>Hands treatments/manicure</h4>
While hands and nails care is usually restricted to just a few services, we've got a wide selection of various pedicure methods, just as well as the overall hands skin care treatments...Here's a list of those...

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" height_tablet="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_button admin_label="Button" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/spa-skin-care/hands-treatmentsmanicure/" url_new_window="off" button_text="read more" button_alignment="left" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="btn-offset-1"] [/tm_pb_button][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/services_gentlemensServices.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="center" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h4>Gentlemen's services</h4>
We're proud to be the only SPA &amp; wellness salon in Orlando, that takes men's growing interest in SPA seriously... We have the widest range of men-oriented skin care procedures in the whole state of Florida!

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" height_tablet="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_button admin_label="Button" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/spa-skin-care/gentlemens-services/" url_new_window="off" button_text="read more" button_alignment="left" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="btn-offset-1"] [/tm_pb_button][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section]]]></content:encoded>

<h2>Waxing</h2>
Waxing is a vital way to keep your skin elastic, clean and smooth...

Our SPA &amp; skin care salon has always focused on providing an excellent experience for anyone who wants to wax their facial or body skin...

<strong>Currently, we offer a waxing service for the following body areas:</strong>

&nbsp;

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" max_width="250px" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_margin_tablet="||15px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"]
<ul>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Bikini Plus</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Brazilian Bikini</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Chin</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Eyebrow Arch</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Eyebrow Design</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Arm</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Back Or Chest</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Face (Excludes Eyebrow)</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Leg</li>
</ul>
[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" max_width="250px"]
<ul>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Leg And Brazilian</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Leg With Bikini</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Half Leg</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Lip &amp; Chin</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Lip Wax</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Lip | Eyebrow Arch</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Underarm</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Upper Arm</li>
</ul>

<h3>Hear our happy patients' testimonials:</h3>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="7" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="6" height_phone="5" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Elisa Major" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/testi_1.jpg" quote_icon="off" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" custom_margin_tablet="||20px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop"]

Every once in a while, we girls just have to take a break from our routine daily hectic errands and job and just step aside for some relaxation... Whenever I do it, this is the place where all the relaxation starts at for me...

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Emily Watford" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/testi_2.jpg" quote_icon="off" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Whenever I feel depressed, anxious or just tired, I always need to take some chill pill and relax... Luckily, I always have had this place for those matters... Here I can both delve into a meditative rest and also take care of my skin's health...

		<title>Typography</title>
		<link>http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/typography/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 25 Apr 2016 08:13:14 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/?page_id=423</guid>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;
<h4>Typography</h4>
<h1>Getting a real peace of mind is
never easy on your own...</h1>
We founded this Chicago-based massage salon for just one simple purpose.  It simply is to make this city a safer and a happier, more chillaxed space for anyone. Also, we aim to help any of our clients to get the peace of mind easily. That's on par with helping them get their body regenerated with the new energy and their spirits re-charged with a new power!
<h2>Getting a real peace of mind is never easy
on your own...</h2>
We founded this Chicago-based massage salon for just one simple purpose.  It simply is to make this city a safer and a happier, more chillaxed space for anyone.
<h3>Getting a real peace of mind is never easy on your own...</h3>
We founded this Chicago-based massage salon for just one simple purpose.  It simply is to make this city a safer and a happier, more chillaxed space for anyone.
<h4>We take great pride in our commitment to the ever-evolving
needs of our customers.</h4>
We founded this Chicago-based massage salon for just one simple purpose.  It simply is to make this city a safer and a happier, more chillaxed space for anyone.
<h5>We founded this Chicago-based massage salon for just one simple purpose.  It simply is to make this city a safer and a happier, more chillaxed space for anyone.</h5>
<h6>Reward yourself with an utmost relaxing experience of them all, by signing up for a massage</h6>

<hr />

<h4>Unordered list</h4>
<ul>
 	<li>Swedish Massage</li>
 	<li>Deep Tissue Massage</li>
 	<li>Hot Stones Therapy</li>
 	<li>Pre &amp; Post Natal Massages</li>
 	<li>Aromatherapy Massage</li>
 	<li>Revitalizing Massagea</li>
 	<li>Sticks &amp; Stones Massage</li>
 	<li>Sports Massage</li>
</ul>

<h4>Call To Action</h4>

<h4>Toggles</h4>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="off" height="33px" height_tablet="30" height_phone="28" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_accordion admin_label="Accordion" open_toggle_background_color="#f8f8f8" toggle_font_size="17" toggle_line_height="1" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" closed_toggle_background_color="#ffffff" toggle_text_color="#006899" icon_color="#616262" disabled="off" disabled_on="off||" body_line_height="1.6em" toggle_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop"] [tm_pb_accordion_item title="Waxing"]

Waxing is a vital way to keep you skin elastic, clean and smooth...

Our SPA &amp; skin care salon has always focused on providing an excellent experience for anyone who wants to wax their facial or body skin...

[/tm_pb_accordion_item][tm_pb_accordion_item title="Facial care"]

While everyone knows, that having a regular facial skin care session is vital for keeping up with your health and keeping your look fresh and young, we know it better, than anybody else!

That's all due to our long experience in providing thousands of women with a top notch level of facial skin care, with its quality and price kept intact.

All of our SPA specialists have an amazingly extensive practical experience and all of the cosmetic facial products that we're using have a great record of acclaim and immediate results, instantly seen after one of our care procedures...

[/tm_pb_accordion_item][tm_pb_accordion_item title="Medi-spa"]

Besides providing regular face &amp; body skin care and a range of other SPA services, we have a separate medical SPA range as well...

[/tm_pb_accordion_item] [/tm_pb_accordion][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="off" height="20" height_tablet="18" height_phone="16" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

<h4>Tabs</h4>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="off"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_tabs admin_label="Tabs" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_line_height="1.2em"] [tm_pb_tab title="Massages" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

Massages have always been a vital part of any essential SPA range of services...

Besides providing a great stress relief and a profound level of relaxation for anyone, massages are also proven to be good for your health!

Basically, any good skin care session must include a massage, fit specifically for the treatment type a patient gets...

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="Body treatments" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

Treating your body with care and love is an essential way to stay looking young, to keep your skin radiantly fresh and healthy...

Our cosmetologists and aestheticians have proved time and again, that they're capable of providing an excellent range of body treatment services, while keeping their focus on a great customer experience as well...

[/tm_pb_tab][tm_pb_tab title="Feet treatments/pedicure" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]

Taking a good care about your feet and nails is essential.

We provide an ultimate, SPA induced services for refreshing your health and enhancing your aesthetics...

<h4>Person</h4>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="off" height_tablet="27" height_phone="25" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Mary Fruition" position="Salon's owner" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team04.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="#" twitter_url="#" google_url="#" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#006899" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/mary-fruition/"]
<p id="cache8"><span id="cache9">Before setting up her own salon, Mary's been working at a prestigious SPA venue in North Carolina...</span></p>
<p id="cache10"><span id="cache11">There she was able to save a sufficient amount of a principal capital in order to set up her very own SPA &amp; skin care salon in Orlando, Florida...  </span></p>
[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Emily Nichols" position="Senior SPA specialist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team02.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="#" twitter_url="#" google_url="#" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#006899" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/emily-nichols/"]

<span id="cache21">Emily's career as a SPA care specialist has spanned to include work at numerous prestigious salons across the US...But after moving with her family from the state of New York to Orlando, Florida, Emily have made a fortunate decision to become a part of our salon's team!</span>

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="off" height_last_edited="on|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Stacy Blunt" position="Junior SPA specialist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team03.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="#" twitter_url="#" google_url="#" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#006899" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/stacy-blunt/"]
<p id="cache8"><span id="cache9">The reason why Stacy is so natural with everything regarding skin's health and skin care treatments may have to do with her prior medical degree...</span></p>
<p id="cache10"><span id="cache11">For a few years following her med school graduation she's been soul searching for a perfect job field, and thankfully she found one!</span></p>
[/tm_pb_team_member][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Danielle Johns" position="Junior SPA specialist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team05.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="#" twitter_url="#" google_url="#" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" header_text_color="#006899" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/danielle-johns/"]
<p id="cache9"><span id="cache10">Danielle has been working in a SPA industry well since she was 17... Her skills and her positive style of work have swiftly made her our leading specialist in the feet and hands treatment fields!</span></p>
<p id="cache11"><span id="cache12">Also, Danielle is the head of our SPA salon's Gentlemen's services department. </span></p>
[/tm_pb_team_member][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="15px" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="off" height_tablet="14px" height_phone="13px" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

<h3>Pricing</h3>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50px" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="40px" height_phone="30px" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_pricing_tables admin_label="Pricing Tables" show_bullet="on" center_list_items="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" remove_featured_drop_shadow="off" header_font_size="22px"] [tm_pb_pricing_table featured="off" title="Weekly Manicure" currency="$" per="week" sum="49" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/book-a-spa-session/" button_text="book a spa session" header_font_select="default" header_font="||||" subheader_font_select="default" subheader_font="||||" currency_frequency_font_select="default" currency_frequency_font="||||" price_font_select="default" price_font="||||" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" custom_button="off" button_font_select="default" button_font="||||" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on"]

Take care of your hands and nails by signing up for a weekly manicure pack. Get up to a half of regular price off!

[/tm_pb_pricing_table][tm_pb_pricing_table featured="on" title="Monthly Medi-Spa" currency="$" per="month" sum="199" header_font_select="default" header_font="||||" subheader_font_select="default" subheader_font="||||" currency_frequency_font_select="default" currency_frequency_font="||||" price_font_select="default" price_font="||||" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" custom_button="off" button_font_select="default" button_font="||||" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_text="book a spa session" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/book-a-spa-session/"]

Get onboard for our monthly session of health-inducing and body revitalizing medi-spa! Besides being good for your health it will also come cheaper that way!

[/tm_pb_pricing_table][tm_pb_pricing_table featured="off" title="Weekly Pedicure" currency="$" per="week" sum="49" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/book-a-spa-session/" button_text="book a spa session" header_font_select="default" header_font="||||" subheader_font_select="default" subheader_font="||||" currency_frequency_font_select="default" currency_frequency_font="||||" price_font_select="default" price_font="||||" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" custom_button="off" button_font_select="default" button_font="||||" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on"]

Make feet treatments a regular staple for each week! Book our weekly pedicure and feet treatment package and save up to a half of the initial pricing!

[/tm_pb_pricing_table] [/tm_pb_pricing_tables][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="29px" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="27px" height_phone="25px" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="off" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on" module_class="service-info"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="27" height_phone="25" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Book a SPA Session by calling us at:</span></h4>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="555–123–2323" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f095" icon_color="#006899" use_circle="on" circle_color="#ffffff" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" circle_size="60" circle_border_width="1" icon_font_size="50px" circle_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_text_color="#006899"] [/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

<span style="color: #006899;">Cost starts at: <strong><span class="price">$80.00</span></strong></span>

<span style="color: #006899;">Duration starts at: <strong>1h 20m</strong></span>

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#f6f6f6" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="83" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h3>Hear our happy patients' testimonials:</h3>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="7" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="6" height_phone="5" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Elisa Major" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/testi_1.jpg" quote_icon="off" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" custom_margin_tablet="||20px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop"]

Every once in a while, we girls just have to take a break from our routine daily hectic errands and job and just step aside for some relaxation... Whenever I do it, this is the place where all the relaxation starts at for me...

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Emily Watford" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/testi_2.jpg" quote_icon="off" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Whenever I feel depressed, anxious or just tired, I always need to take some chill pill and relax... Luckily, I always have had this place for those matters... Here I can both delve into a meditative rest and take care of my skin health...

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="94px" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" global_module="355" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="off" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on" background_color="#ffffff"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider global_parent="355" admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="82" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text global_parent="355" admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

	<item>
		<title>Can zinc be a cure for skin Acne?</title>
		<link>http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/2016/06/27/can-zinc-be-a-cure-for-skin-acne/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 27 Jun 2016 07:58:29 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/?p=1</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Do Zinc Supplements help in treating the Acne? In order to get the answers on the zinc supplements and acne connection straight, one of our guest experts, Dr. Bailey turned to the Journal of Drugs in Dermatology. Dr. Bailey found a systematic review of multiple studies which covered zinc supplements and acne efficacy in a past edition of the journal.

First thing first, shall we talk about a few key terms before we move forward? That will help us in
<div id="u188" class="text">
<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Dehydration</span></h4>
Skin dehydration is a basic process of when your skin is healthy, it will get rid of  dead skin cells up and out through the skin pores (in other words, it exfoliates itself and regenerates the new skin).

Still, there's a whole multitude of chemical products that will dehydrate your skin (ie. not enough water left in the skin layers). As your skin is dehydrated, it will begin to trap those dead skin cells and the chemical junk leftover in makeups and other skin care products into your pores.
<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Extreme skin sensitivity</span></h4>
Clogged Pores, Sensitive Red Skin, Rosacea are all the telling signs that your skin health suffers from an extreme sensitivity...

The chemicals included in it, can act to heighten an increase in skin's sensitivity, as well as it can thin your skin and remove the protective barrier. This means that the skin and pores become too responsive towards what you're applying on it.

If that's true, the skin will be responding actively to even the slightest external stimulation... That kind of reaction starts sending more blood flow to the area, making your face red and blotchy, resulting in some bright long lasting hyper-pigmentation marks, increased acne, etc.
<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Trapped skin pores inflammation</span></h4>
The blood flow, which usually follows even the slightest skin stimulation then gets trapped within the pore. Those pores, in turn, get clogged with dead skin cells, oil, and chemical ingredients, which will simply stagnate there.

This blood flow stagnation scars the natural collagen in the pore (collagen being our skin’s supportive and regenerative component), so the scar tissue will die and get clogged inside the pore alongside the dead skin cells.

This results in scarring, pitting, big pores, and lots of redness and breakouts. If you can't yet spot that scarring on the surface now, if left unfixed it will inevitably become more visible over time.

And if the pressure in the skin's pores gets too high, it will become full on inflammation, rupture the pore and spread to the next pore, spreading the problem across your skin.
<h6><strong>Okay so let’s get to the ingredients oftentimes used in the skin care products, that you may want to be avoiding:</strong></h6>
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Silicones</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

Methicone, dimethicone, trimethicone, cyclomethicone, siloxane, cyclopentasiloxane, cyclotetrasiloxane, cyclohexasiloxane, silsesquioxane, trimethylsiloxysilicate, methylpolysiloxane, stearoxytrimethylsilane

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

Add a silky and smooth touch...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

Apparently silicones are one of the most harmful ingredients out there. They contribute to dehydrating the skin and clogging the pores, which oftentimes marks the beginning of redness, pore scarring, and acne breakouts.
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Petrochemicals</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

Paraffin wax, mineral oil, toluene, benzene, petrolatum, and anything that ends in “eth”, “decane”, or contains the words PEG (polyethylene glycol), DEA (diethanolamine), MEA (ethanolamine), TEA (triethanolamine), butyl, methyl, propyl, ethyl, ethanol

<strong>Examples:</strong>

propylene glycol, PEG-40, laureth sulfate, phenoxyethanol, butylene glycol or butyl stearate, EDTA (ethylene-diamine-tetracetatic acid), isopropyl alcohol, methylparaben, ceteareth-20, BHA (butylated hydroxyanisole), BHT (butylated hydroxytoluene), dodecane

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

It usually either locks the moisture in the skin pores, keeping it moisturized or acts as a skin preservative in any other relevant way...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

Petroleum derived ingredients are pore clogging components, which work as a delivery agent, meaning they trap all other junk in the product deeper into the pores. Sometimes they may come with such hazardous ingredients as the 1,4-dioxane, a carcinogen and neurotoxin...
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Parabens</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

acnemethylparaben, propylparaben, ethylparaben, butylparaben

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

Supposedly they make the mold growth stop and also extend the shelf life of the product...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

All of these are highly toxic and are harmful to your endocrine system. In other words, those are hormone messer uppers. When you are trying to heal from acne, you don’t want that.
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Phthalates</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

pthalatesDEP (diethyl phthalate), DBP (di-n-butyl phthalate), BzBP (benzylbutyl phthalate)

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

Usually, those ingredients are meant to homogenize the product and dissolve solid ingredients. Also used to make the fragrance stay...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

Same as parabens… they disrupt your hormones and mess the hormone system up...

To summarize, it's important to keep in mind that when you look up for your skin care product's contents, the ingredients are enlisted with the highest quantity first. They go down the list in a descending order (from more to less)...

So the first ingredient listed is the main ingredient with the highest quantity of the product.

If you come across a “baddie” ingredient it’s going to be less of a big deal if it’s at the end of the list (ex. 0.05% of the whole product), rather than if it’s close to the top (ex. 50% of the whole product).

</div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>

		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>

		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="cosmetic-products"><![CDATA[cosmetic products]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="facial-care-tips"><![CDATA[Facial care tips]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="salons-news"><![CDATA[Salon's news]]></category>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="skin"><![CDATA[skin]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="uncategorized"><![CDATA[Uncategorized]]></category>

			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
