		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_section admin_label="section"][tm_pb_row admin_label="row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="on|desktop" saved_tabs="all"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h2>Hands treatments/manicure</h2>
While hands and nails care is usually restricted to just a few services, we've got a wide selection of various pedicure methods, just as well as the overall hands skin care treatments...

<strong>Here's a list of those:</strong>

&nbsp;

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" max_width="300px" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_margin_tablet="||15px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"]
<ul>
 	<li>Regular Manicure</li>
 	<li>Spa Manicure</li>
 	<li>Paraffin + Hot Towel Wraps</li>
 	<li>Gel Pedicure</li>
 	<li>Acrylic Full Set</li>
 	<li>Polish Change - Hands &amp; Toes</li>
 	<li>French Manicure</li>
</ul>
[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" max_width="300px"]
<ul>
 	<li>Gradation</li>
 	<li>Nails designs</li>
 	<li>Nail Fix</li>
 	<li>Gel Take Off</li>
 	<li>Acrylic Take Off</li>
 	<li>Paraffin</li>
</ul>
[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="36" divider_style="solid" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="custom-swiper" saved_tabs="all"] [tm_pb_slide background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/services_manicure.jpg" background_position="default" background_size="initial" background_color="#ffffff" use_bg_overlay="off" use_text_overlay="off" alignment="center" allow_player_pause="off" text_border_radius="3" header_font_select="default" header_font="||||" 		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_section admin_label="section"][tm_pb_row admin_label="row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="on|desktop" saved_tabs="all"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h2>Gentlemen's services</h2>
We're proud to be the only SPA &amp; wellness salon in Orlando, that took a serious consideration for men's growing interest in SPA procedures...

We have the widest range of men-oriented skin care procedures in the whole state of Florida, which is probably one of the reasons why our make clientele grows so fast.

<strong>Here's a list of men-centric SPA &amp; skin care wellness procedures that we have:</strong>

&nbsp;

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" max_width="550px" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_margin_tablet="||15px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"]
<ul>
 	<li>Back Facial
Purifies And Tones Back With The Refined Technique Of Our Finest Facial. Includes A Custom Mask And A Warm Stone Neck Massage.</li>
 	<li>Deep Tissue Massage - 80 Mi</li>
 	<li>Deep Tissue Massage 50 Min</li>
</ul>
[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" max_width="250px"]
<ul>
 	<li>Full Back Or Chest</li>
 	<li>Gentleman's Facial</li>
 	<li>Gentleman's Manicure</li>
 	<li>Gentleman's Pedicure</li>
</ul>

[/tm_pb_slide][tm_pb_slide background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/services_facialCare.jpg" background_position="default" background_size="cover" background_color="#ffffff" use_bg_overlay="off" use_text_overlay="off" alignment="center" allow_player_pause="off" text_border_radius="3" header_font_select="default" header_font="||||" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" custom_button="off" button_font_select="default" button_font="||||" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on"]

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

[/tm_pb_slide] [/tm_pb_slider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="off" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on" module_class="service-info"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="27" height_phone="25" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Book a SPA Session by calling us at:</span></h4>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="555–123–2323" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f095" icon_color="#006899" use_circle="on" circle_color="#ffffff" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" circle_size="60" circle_border_width="1" icon_font_size="50px" circle_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_text_color="#006899"] [/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

<span style="color: #006899;">Cost starts at: <strong><span class="price">$80.00</span></strong></span>

<span style="color: #006899;">Duration starts at: <strong>1h 20m</strong></span>

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#5e6d86" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="82" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="40" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_cta admin_label="Call To Action" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/book-a-spa-session/" url_new_window="off" button_text="Book a SPA session" use_background_color="off" background_color="#0095e5" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="invert text-center" max_width_tablet="100%" max_width_last_edited="off|desktop" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="50" header_font_size_tablet="40" header_font_size_phone="30" header_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" saved_tabs="all"]
<h3>If you're looking for that perfect relaxation getaway... or want to take care of your skin's health and looks, then we're the place to go... We provide an ultimate, universal set of SPA &amp; skin care procedures for both women and men!</h3>
[/tm_pb_cta][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="121" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="off|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#f6f6f6" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="83" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h3>Hear our happy patients' testimonials:</h3>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="7" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="6" height_phone="5" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Elisa Major" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/testi_1.jpg" quote_icon="off" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" custom_margin_tablet="||20px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop"]

Every once in a while, we girls just have to take a break from our routine daily hectic errands and job and just step aside for some relaxation... Whenever I do it, this is the place where all the relaxation starts at for me...

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Emily Watford" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/testi_2.jpg" quote_icon="off" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Whenever I feel depressed, anxious or just tired, I always need to take some chill pill and relax... Luckily, I always have had this place for those matters... Here I can both delve into a meditative rest and also take care of my skin's health...

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="94px" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" global_module="355" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="off" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on" background_color="#ffffff"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider global_parent="355" admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="82" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text global_parent="355" admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Do men learn to love SPA too?</title>
		<link>http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/2016/07/13/do-men-learn-to-love-spa-too/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 13 Jul 2016 13:59:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/?p=2160</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[In the last few years, SPA salons across the US have gotten a brand new clientele type, they've rarely worked with before. These are the men! It's not a secret, but rather a nationwide growing trend and the fact that men decided to dedicate more of their time and money for taking care of their skin is definitely a good thing.

First thing first, shall we talk about a few key terms before we move forward? That will help us in
<div id="u188" class="text">
<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Dehydration</span></h4>
Skin dehydration is a basic process of when your skin is healthy, it will get rid of  dead skin cells up and out through the skin pores (in other words, it exfoliates itself and regenerates the new skin).

Still, there's a whole multitude of chemical products that will dehydrate your skin (ie. not enough water left in the skin layers). As your skin is dehydrated, it will begin to trap those dead skin cells and the chemical junk leftover in makeups and other skin care products into your pores.
<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Extreme skin sensitivity</span></h4>
Clogged Pores, Sensitive Red Skin, Rosacea are all the telling signs that your skin health suffers from an extreme sensitivity...

The chemicals included in it, can act to heighten an increase in skin's sensitivity, as well as it can thin your skin and remove the protective barrier. This means that the skin and pores become too responsive towards what you're applying on it.

If that's true, the skin will be responding actively to even the slightest external stimulation... That kind of reaction starts sending more blood flow to the area, making your face red and blotchy, resulting in some bright long lasting hyper-pigmentation marks, increased acne, etc.
<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Trapped skin pores inflammation</span></h4>
The blood flow, which usually follows even the slightest skin stimulation then gets trapped within the pore. Those pores, in turn, get clogged with dead skin cells, oil, and chemical ingredients, which will simply stagnate there.

This blood flow stagnation scars the natural collagen in the pore (collagen being our skin’s supportive and regenerative component), so the scar tissue will die and get clogged inside the pore alongside the dead skin cells.

This results in scarring, pitting, big pores, and lots of redness and breakouts. If you can't yet spot that scarring on the surface now, if left unfixed it will inevitably become more visible over time.

And if the pressure in the skin's pores gets too high, it will become full on inflammation, rupture the pore and spread to the next pore, spreading the problem across your skin.
<h6><strong>Okay so let’s get to the ingredients oftentimes used in the skin care products, that you may want to be avoiding:</strong></h6>
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Silicones</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

Methicone, dimethicone, trimethicone, cyclomethicone, siloxane, cyclopentasiloxane, cyclotetrasiloxane, cyclohexasiloxane, silsesquioxane, trimethylsiloxysilicate, methylpolysiloxane, stearoxytrimethylsilane

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

Add a silky and smooth touch...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

Apparently silicones are one of the most harmful ingredients out there. They contribute to dehydrating the skin and clogging the pores, which oftentimes marks the beginning of redness, pore scarring, and acne breakouts.
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Petrochemicals</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

Paraffin wax, mineral oil, toluene, benzene, petrolatum, and anything that ends in “eth”, “decane”, or contains the words PEG (polyethylene glycol), DEA (diethanolamine), MEA (ethanolamine), TEA (triethanolamine), butyl, methyl, propyl, ethyl, ethanol

<strong>Examples:</strong>

propylene glycol, PEG-40, laureth sulfate, phenoxyethanol, butylene glycol or butyl stearate, EDTA (ethylene-diamine-tetracetatic acid), isopropyl alcohol, methylparaben, ceteareth-20, BHA (butylated hydroxyanisole), BHT (butylated hydroxytoluene), dodecane

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

It usually either locks the moisture in the skin pores, keeping it moisturized or acts as a skin preservative in any other relevant way...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

Petroleum derived ingredients are pore clogging components, which work as a delivery agent, meaning they trap all other junk in the product deeper into the pores. Sometimes they may come with such hazardous ingredients as the 1,4-dioxane, a carcinogen and neurotoxin...
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Parabens</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

acnemethylparaben, propylparaben, ethylparaben, butylparaben

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

Supposedly they make the mold growth stop and also extend the shelf life of the product...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

All of these are highly toxic and are harmful to your endocrine system. In other words, those are hormone messer uppers. When you are trying to heal from acne, you don’t want that.
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Phthalates</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

pthalatesDEP (diethyl phthalate), DBP (di-n-butyl phthalate), BzBP (benzylbutyl phthalate)

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

Usually, those ingredients are meant to homogenize the product and dissolve solid ingredients. Also used to make the fragrance stay...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

Same as parabens… they disrupt your hormones and mess the hormone system up...

To summarize, it's important to keep in mind that when you look up for your skin care product's contents, the ingredients are enlisted with the highest quantity first. They go down the list in a descending order (from more to less)...

So the first ingredient listed is the main ingredient with the highest quantity of the product.

If you come across a “baddie” ingredient it’s going to be less of a big deal if it’s at the end of the list (ex. 0.05% of the whole product), rather than if it’s close to the top (ex. 50% of the whole product).

</div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[In the last few years, SPA salons across the US have gotten a brand new clientele type, they've rarely worked with before. These are the men! It's not a secret, but rather a nationwide growing trend and the fact that men decided...]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Do men learn to love SPA too?</title>
		<link>http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/2016/04/28/are-facial-care-sessions-a-pampering-or-a-health-necessity__trashed/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Apr 2016 14:59:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/?p=26</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_section admin_label="section"][tm_pb_row admin_label="row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

In the last few years, SPA salons across the US have gotten a brand new clientele type, they've rarely worked with before. These are the men! It's not a secret, but rather a nationwide growing trend and the fact that men decided to dedicate more of their time and money for taking care of their skin is definitely a good thing.

But anyway… let’s talk about which specific chemicals and comedogenic ingredients are the ones to be definitely avoided in your makeup products, and why.

First thing first, shall we talk about a few key terms before we move forward? That will help us in

&nbsp;
<div id="u188" class="text">
<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Dehydration</span></h4>
Skin dehydration is a basic process of when your skin is healthy, it will get rid of  dead skin cells up and out through the skin pores (in other words, it exfoliates itself and regenerates the new skin).

Still, there's a whole multitude of chemical products that will dehydrate your skin (ie. not enough water left in the skin layers). As your skin is dehydrated, it will begin to trap those dead skin cells and the chemical junk leftover in makeups and other skin care products into your pores.

&nbsp;
<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Extreme skin sensitivity</span></h4>
Clogged Pores, Sensitive Red Skin, Rosacea are all the telling signs that your skin health suffers from an extreme sensitivity...

The chemicals included in it, can act to heighten an increase in skin's sensitivity, as well as it can thin your skin and remove the protective barrier. This means that the skin and pores become too responsive towards what you're applying on it.

If that's true, the skin will be responding actively to even the slightest external stimulation... That kind of reaction starts sending more blood flow to the area, making your face red and blotchy, resulting in some bright long lasting hyper-pigmentation marks, increased acne, etc.

&nbsp;
<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Trapped skin pores inflammation</span></h4>
The blood flow, which usually follows even the slightest skin stimulation then gets trapped within the pore. Those pores, in turn, get clogged with dead skin cells, oil, and chemical ingredients, which will simply stagnate there.

This blood flow stagnation scars the natural collagen in the pore (collagen being our skin’s supportive and regenerative component), so the scar tissue will die and get clogged inside the pore alongside the dead skin cells.

This results in scarring, pitting, big pores, and lots of redness and breakouts. If you can't yet spot that scarring on the surface now, if left unfixed it will inevitably become more visible over time.

And if the pressure in the skin's pores gets too high, it will become full on inflammation, rupture the pore and spread to the next pore, spreading the problem across your skin.
<h6><strong>Okay so let’s get to the ingredients oftentimes used in the skin care products, that you may want to be avoiding:</strong></h6>
&nbsp;
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Silicones</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

Methicone, dimethicone, trimethicone, cyclomethicone, siloxane, cyclopentasiloxane, cyclotetrasiloxane, cyclohexasiloxane, silsesquioxane, trimethylsiloxysilicate, methylpolysiloxane, stearoxytrimethylsilane

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

Add a silky and smooth touch...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

Apparently silicones are one of the most harmful ingredients out there. They contribute to dehydrating the skin and clogging the pores, which oftentimes marks the beginning of redness, pore scarring, and acne breakouts.

&nbsp;
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Petrochemicals</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

Paraffin wax, mineral oil, toluene, benzene, petrolatum, and anything that ends in “eth”, “decane”, or contains the words PEG (polyethylene glycol), DEA (diethanolamine), MEA (ethanolamine), TEA (triethanolamine), butyl, methyl, propyl, ethyl, ethanol

<strong>Examples:</strong>

propylene glycol, PEG-40, laureth sulfate, phenoxyethanol, butylene glycol or butyl stearate, EDTA (ethylene-diamine-tetracetatic acid), isopropyl alcohol, methylparaben, ceteareth-20, BHA (butylated hydroxyanisole), BHT (butylated hydroxytoluene), dodecane

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

It usually either locks the moisture in the skin pores, keeping it moisturized or acts as a skin preservative in any other relevant way...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

Petroleum derived ingredients are pore clogging components, which work as a delivery agent, meaning they trap all other junk in the product deeper into the pores. Sometimes they may come with such hazardous ingredients as the 1,4-dioxane, a carcinogen and neurotoxin...

&nbsp;
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Parabens</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

acnemethylparaben, propylparaben, ethylparaben, butylparaben

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

Supposedly they make the mold growth stop and also extend the shelf life of the product...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

All of these are highly toxic and are harmful to your endocrine system. In other words, those are hormone messer uppers. When you are trying to heal from acne, you don’t want that.

&nbsp;
<h5><span style="color: #006899;">Phthalates</span></h5>
<strong>Names:</strong>

pthalatesDEP (diethyl phthalate), DBP (di-n-butyl phthalate), BzBP (benzylbutyl phthalate)

<strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong>

Usually, those ingredients are meant to homogenize the product and dissolve solid ingredients. Also used to make the fragrance stay...

<strong>What they actually do:</strong>

Same as parabens… they disrupt your hormones and mess the hormone system up...

&nbsp;

To summarize, it's important to keep in mind that when you look up for your skin care product's contents, the ingredients are enlisted with the highest quantity first. They go down the list in a descending order (from more to less)...

So the first ingredient listed is the main ingredient with the highest quantity of the product.

If you come across a “baddie” ingredient it’s going to be less of a big deal if it’s at the end of the list (ex. 0.05% of the whole product), rather than if it’s close to the top (ex. 50% of the whole product).

</div>
[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[It's always been a common question, that a majority of our clients have always been asking us... Basically, facial care, which involves skin cleansing & pores cleansing.]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="aging-facelifts"><![CDATA[Aging &amp; Facelifts]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="facial-care-tips"><![CDATA[Facial care tips]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[post_sidebar]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:2:{s:15:"sidebar-primary";s:0:"";s:11:"footer-area";s:0:"";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_tm_sidebar_position]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[inherit]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_tm_pb_use_builder]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[on]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_tm_pb_old_content]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<p>It's impossible not to notice, how our modern pop culture's stereotypes influence how women supposedly should look after giving birth. It all comes down to a not-so-realistic picture, an expectation that many believe are unattainable and simply impossible to achieve with anything conventional... Indeed, many medical experts say, that burning calories with a breastfeeding will not burn all the calories you consume, just as well as too much fitness and other physical activities immediately after giving the birth will not give you a picture perfect either. With the daily (even hourly) ravage of Instagram photos by the likes of Kim Kardashian and Gisele Bündchen of our pop-culture, it's hard to avoid that kind of pressure. Eventually, women feel the need to lose weight and tighten up just weeks after welcoming their baby. Dr. Diana Zuckerberg, president of the National Research Center for Women & Families, describes this as "the social pressure effect": “It forces even the most beautiful women to get a surgery in order to look "more attractive".</p><h4>Dr. Zuckerberg explains it in more detail:</h4><p><em>“Yes, we're all aware that a pregnancy does change our bodies, but let’s not see this as a total disaster that needs to be fixed for every single woman.”</em> This provokes a reasonable question, such as: Did the rise of the mommy makeover craze come about because of media and resulting societal pressures? Or maybe it's just that some women simply want their pre-baby bodies and self-confidence back?</p><p>To get the facts straight about the reasoning among women who undergo a cosmetic surgery after having a baby, we polled mothers of all age ranges. The results are interesting: 99.5% of them had work done after they had a child (or children) and 85% of them have had more than two kids.</p><p>Though, talking about pros to undergo a surgery, medics warn that when we're discussing the subject of getting that post-pregnancy body back in shape, neither crash dieting nor a strict and exhausting exercise programs are the way to go. This is especially true in case you've gone through a difficult pregnancy or a C-section delivery or are breastfeeding at the moment....</p><p><em>"The worst thing a woman can do is try too hard to do too much too soon. In other words, if you do, you're likely to get yourself exhausted and discouraged. All of it will make it less likely for you to continue either a diet or exercises, and you'll end up carrying that baby weight a lot longer, "</em> says fitness trainer Sue Fleming, creator of the Buff line of workout DVDs including Buff New Moms.</p><h4>A Final Word of Caution</h4><p><strong>No matter how eager you are to lose a post-pregnancy fat, experts caution against any activities that put major stress on your joints. The list includes jogging, jumping, or running  for at least six to eight weeks.</strong></p>]]></wp:meta_value>

	<item>
		<title>blurb_features</title>
		<link>http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/tm_pb_layout/blurb_features-2/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 14 Apr 2016 16:25:57 +0000</pubDate>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#fdfbf8" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off" module_class="extranoborder" template_type="section"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="79" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|desktop"]



[/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" max_width="770px" max_width_tablet="100%" max_width_last_edited="on|desktop" text_text_color="#33cba5"]

<h3>We're a #1 Orlando SPA for a number of reasons:</h3>

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="37" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="30" height_phone="25" height_last_edited="on|desktop"]



[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Variety of Care" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" font_icon="f02d" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" header_text_color="#006899" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img8.jpg" icon_font_size_last_edited="off|desktop" circle_size_last_edited="off|desktop" header_font="||on||" custom_padding="||15px|" custom_padding_target=".tm_pb_blurb h4" module_class="blurb-heading-inset-1"]

<p>Our salon is unique among other Orlando's SPAs, all thanks to an insurmountable variety of skin care and relaxation choices that we have...</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Handy Staff" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" font_icon="f0c0" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" header_text_color="#006899" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#616262" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img9.jpg" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" circle_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_font="||on||" module_class="blurb-heading-inset-1"]

<p>All of the salon's staff members are perfectly qualified to get you relaxed &amp; cared for... That's all due to their immense talent and skills their hands have...</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Relaxation-centric" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" font_icon="f017" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" header_text_color="#006899" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#616262" custom_margin_phone="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img10-1.jpg" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" circle_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_font="||on||" module_class="blurb-heading-inset-1"]

<p>First and foremost, we're a relaxation getaway... With the help of our nurturing and skin's health enhancing services you'll be feeling yourself just like in heaven!</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Affordable prices" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" font_icon="f087" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" header_text_color="#006899" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#616262" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img11-1.jpg" header_font="||on||" module_class="blurb-heading-inset-1"]

<p>As opposed to our competitors, we never hike the prices to an unreachable height... Our surgeries pricing is down-to-earth and affordable for anyone!</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"]

<h3>What our patients say</h3>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="7" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Herbert Wallace " url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img14.jpg" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" testi_date="May 10, 2016"]

I urgently required dental help last 4th of July. And despite all other clinics being closed, BeDentist took my appointment!

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Gary Growles " url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img15.jpg" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" testi_date="May 10, 2016"]

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Daniela Robbery" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img16.jpg" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" testi_date="May 10, 2016"]

	<item>
		<title>Team</title>
		<link>http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/tm_pb_layout/team/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 03 May 2016 14:27:52 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/tm_pb_layout/team/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" parallax_4="off" parallax_method_4="off" column_padding_mobile="on" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Mary Fruition" position="Salon's owner" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team04.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/mary-fruition/"]

<p id="cache8"><span id="cache9">Before setting up her own salon, Mary's been working at a prestigious SPA venue in North Carolina...</span></p>
<p id="cache10"><span id="cache11">There she was able to save a sufficient amount of a principal capital in order to set up her very own SPA &amp; skin care salon in Orlando, Florida...&nbsp; </span></p>

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Emily Nichols" position="Senior SPA specialist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team02.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_phone="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/emily-nichols/"]

<p><span id="cache21">Emily's career as a SPA care specialist has spanned to include work at numerous prestigious salons across the US...But after moving with her family from the state of New York to Orlando, Florida, Emily have made a fortunate decision to become a part of our salon's team!</span></p>

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Stacy Blunt" position="Junior SPA specialist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team03.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_padding_tablet="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/stacy-blunt/"]

<p id="cache8"><span id="cache9">The reason why Stacy is so natural with everything regarding skin's health and skin care treatments may have to do with her prior medical degree...</span></p>
<p id="cache10"><span id="cache11">For a few years following her med school graduation she's been soul searching for a perfect job field, and thankfully she found one!</span></p>

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Danielle Johns" position="Junior SPA specialist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/team05.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_tablet="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/team/danielle-johns/"]

<p id="cache9"><span id="cache10">Danielle has been working in a SPA industry well since she was 17... Her skills and her positive style of work have swiftly made her our leading specialist in the feet and hands treatment fields!</span></p>
<p id="cache11"><span id="cache12">Also, Danielle is the head of our SPA salon's Gentlemen's services department. </span></p>

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]]]></content:encoded>

Sometimes it involves Dental Filling and Bonding, which are quite simple dental procedures. 	<item>
		<title>Reasons</title>
		<link>http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/tm_pb_layout/reasons/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 10 Jun 2016 13:18:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/tm_pb_layout/reasons/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" global_module="197" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#f6f6f6" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off" template_type="section"][tm_pb_row global_parent="197" admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider global_parent="197" admin_label="Divider" color="#e0e0e8" show_divider="on" divider_style="solid" height_last_edited="off|"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_divider global_parent="197" admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="on" height="79" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|desktop"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text global_parent="197" admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" max_width="770px" max_width_tablet="100%" max_width_last_edited="on|desktop" text_text_color="#33cba5"]

<h3>Reasons to choose Dr. Wallbert's plastic surgery clinic:</h3>

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider global_parent="197" admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="37" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="30" height_phone="25" height_last_edited="on|desktop"]

</p>

[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row global_parent="197" admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb global_parent="197" admin_label="Blurb" title="Range of surgeries" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" font_icon="f02d" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="50px" header_text_color="#33cba5" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#616262" circle_size="133px" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img8.jpg"]

<p>Dr Wallbert's clinic offers a variety of plastic surgery options to choose. From a nose job to liposuctions...</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb global_parent="197" admin_label="Blurb" title="Advanced equipment" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" font_icon="f0c0" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="50px" header_text_color="#33cba5" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#616262" circle_size="133px" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img9.jpg"]

<p>All of our surgery and post-recovery facilities are equipped with the latest, most advanced and robust medical equipment and medication.</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb global_parent="197" admin_label="Blurb" title="Experienced medics" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" font_icon="f017" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="50px" header_text_color="#33cba5" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#616262" circle_size="133" custom_margin_phone="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img10-1.jpg"]

<p>Dr. Wallbert and all of his assistants, as well as the team of nurses have a vast practical experience in helping people to look and feel better!</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb global_parent="197" admin_label="Blurb" title="Affordable prices" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" font_icon="f087" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="50px" header_text_color="#33cba5" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#616262" circle_size="133" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img11-1.jpg"]

<p>As opposed to our competitors, we never hike the prices to an unreachable height... Our surgeries pricing is down-to-earth and affordable for anyone!</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row global_parent="197" admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider global_parent="197" admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"]

</p>

<h3>Waxing</h3>
Waxing is a vital way to keep you skin elastic, clean and smooth...

Our SPA &amp; skin care salon has always focused on providing an excellent experience for anyone who wants to wax their facial or body skin...

<strong>Currently, we offer a waxing service for the following body areas:</strong>

&nbsp;

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" max_width="250px" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin="||0px|" custom_margin_tablet="||15px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"]
<ul>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Bikini Plus</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Brazilian Bikini</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Chin</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Eyebrow Arch</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Eyebrow Design</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Arm</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Back Or Chest</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Face (Excludes Eyebrow)</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Leg</li>
</ul>
[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" max_width="250px"]
<ul>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Leg And Brazilian</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Full Leg With Bikini</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Half Leg</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Lip &amp; Chin</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Lip Wax</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Lip | Eyebrow Arch</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Underarm</li>
 	<li style="text-align: left;">Upper Arm</li>
</ul>

<h4><span style="color: #006899;">Book a SPA Session by calling us at:</span></h4>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="555–123–2323" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f095" icon_color="#006899" use_circle="on" circle_color="#ffffff" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" circle_size="60" circle_border_width="1" icon_font_size="50px" circle_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_text_color="#006899"] [/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="20" height_last_edited="on|phone" divider_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

<span style="color: #006899;">Cost starts at: <strong><span class="price">$80.00</span></strong></span>

<span style="color: #006899;">Duration starts at: <strong>1h 20m</strong></span>

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#5e6d86" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="82" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="40" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_cta admin_label="Call To Action" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/book-an-appointment/" url_new_window="off" button_text="Book a SPA session" use_background_color="off" background_color="#0095e5" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="invert text-center" max_width_tablet="100%" max_width_last_edited="off|desktop" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="50" header_font_size_tablet="40" header_font_size_phone="30" header_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop"]
<h3>If you're looking for that perfect relaxation getaway... or want to take care of your skin's health and looks, then we're the place to go... We provide an ultimate, universal set of SPA &amp; skin care procedures for both women and men!</h3>
[/tm_pb_cta][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="121" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="off|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#f6f6f6" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="83" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
<h3>Hear our happy patients' testimonials:</h3>
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="7" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="6" height_phone="5" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Elisa Major" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/testi_1.jpg" quote_icon="off" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" custom_margin_tablet="||20px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop"]

Every once in a while, we girls just have to take a break from our routine daily hectic errands and job and just step aside for some relaxation... Whenever I do it, this is the place where all the relaxation starts at for me...

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Emily Watford" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/testi_2.jpg" quote_icon="off" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Whenever I feel depressed, anxious or just tired, I always need to take some chill pill and relax... Luckily, I always have had this place for those matters... Here I can both delve into a meditative rest and also take care of my skin's health...

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#f6f6f6" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off" template_type="section"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="83" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"]



[/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

<h3>Hear our happy patients' testimonials:</h3>

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="7" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="6" height_phone="5" height_last_edited="on|phone"]



[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Elisa Major" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/testi_1.jpg" quote_icon="off" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" custom_margin_tablet="||20px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop"]

<p>Every once in a while, we girls just have to take a break from our routine daily hectic errands and job and just step aside for some relaxation... Whenever I do it, this is the place where all the relaxation starts at for me...</p>

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Emily Watford" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/testi_2.jpg" quote_icon="off" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

<p>Whenever I feel depressed, anxious or just tired, I always need to take some chill pill and relax... Luckily, I always have had this place for those matters... Here I can both delve into a meditative rest and also take care of my skin's health...</p>

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="94px" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"]

<h2>We're a #1 Orlando SPA for a number of reasons:</h2>

[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e85b" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Variety of Care" url="#" module_class="float-xl-right icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="45" header_font_size_tablet="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

<p>Our salon is unique among other Orlando's SPAs, all thanks to an insurmountable variety of skin care and relaxation choices that we have...</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"]



[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e85a" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Handy Staff" url="#" module_class="float-xl-left icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="45" header_font_size_tablet="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

<p>All of the salon's staff members are perfectly qualified to get you relaxed &amp; cared for... That's all due to their immense talent and skills their hands have...</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"]



[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e802" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Relaxation-centric" url="#" module_class="float-xl-right icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="45" header_font_size_tablet="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

<p>First and foremost, we're a relaxation getaway... With the help of our nurturing and skin's health enhancing services you'll be feeling yourself just like in heaven!</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"]



[/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="e854" icon_color="#c4bbb2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#5e6d86" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#006899" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="80px" icon_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" title="Reasonable costs" url="#" module_class="float-xl-left icon-with-bg" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/home07.png" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="45" header_font_size_tablet="35" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_text_color="#5e6d86"]

<p>As opposed to other Orlando's or Florida's SPAs, we do not target people's wallets eagerly... Our prices' affordability goes intact with our services' quality!</p>

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50" height_tablet="30" height_phone="20" height_last_edited="off|desktop" divider_style="solid"]

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_pricing_tables admin_label="Pricing Tables" show_bullet="on" center_list_items="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" remove_featured_drop_shadow="off" header_font_size="22px" saved_tabs="all" template_type="module"]

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Emily Watford" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/testi_2.jpg" quote_icon="off" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" saved_tabs="all" template_type="module"]

her family from the state of New York to Orlando, Florida, Emily have made a fortunate decision to become a part of our salon's team!</p><p>Since then she's been a vital member of the staff, gaining wide recognition from our customers for her skills and a universal acclaim from all other SPA girls here.</p><p>Most of the time Emily provides services for body and face skin treatments.</p><p>On top [/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb global_parent="272" admin_label="Blurb" title="Medi-spa" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/massages/" [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" global_module="253" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="40" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_contact_form global_parent="253" admin_label="Contact Form" captcha="off" title_font_size="30px" title_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" module_class="custom-form contact-form-text-center"] [tm_pb_contact_field field_title="Your name*" field_type="input" field_id="Name" [/tm_pb_contact_field][tm_pb_contact_field field_id="Subject" field_title="Subject" field_type="input" required_mark="off" fullwidth_field="off" form_field_font_select="default" form_field_font="||||" 	<item>
		<title>cta-on-service-page</title>
		<link>http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/tm_pb_layout/cta-on-service-page/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 13 Jul 2016 15:57:14 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/tm_pb_layout/cta-on-service-page/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tm_pb_cta admin_label="Call To Action" button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/book-a-spa-session/" url_new_window="off" button_text="Book a SPA session" use_background_color="off" background_color="#0095e5" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="invert text-center" max_width_tablet="100%" max_width_last_edited="off|desktop" header_font="Great Vibes||||" header_font_size="50" header_font_size_tablet="40" header_font_size_phone="30" header_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" saved_tabs="all" template_type="module"]

<h3>If you're looking for that perfect relaxation getaway... or want to take care of your skin's health and looks, then we're the place to go... We provide an ultimate, universal set of SPA &amp; skin care procedures for both women and men!</h3>

[/tm_pb_cta]]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>2077</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2016-07-13 15:57:14]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2016-07-13 15:57:14]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[cta-on-service-page]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[tm_pb_layout]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="layout_type" nicename="module"><![CDATA[module]]></category>

	<item>
		<title>post-content</title>
		<link>http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/tm_pb_layout/post-content/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 14 Jul 2016 09:15:09 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_59014-sample/tm_pb_layout/post-content/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>[tm_pb_section admin_label="section"][tm_pb_row admin_label="row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]</p><p>While I was on track to find out more about the secret to a clear skin I've learned a few things. Firstly, it is definitely worth avoiding some of the heavily chemical ingredients, which are usually included typical makeups contents.</p><p>But then again, a majority of the natural skin care products tend to contain coconut oil, which is rather comedogenic. And this basically leaves me wondering now...</p><p>But anyway… let’s talk about which specific chemicals and comedogenic ingredients are the ones to be definitely avoided in your makeup products, and why.</p><p>First thing first, shall we talk about a few key terms before we move forward? That will help us in</p><p> </p><div id="u188" class="text"><h4><span style="color: #006899;">Dehydration</span></h4><p>Skin dehydration is a basic process of when your skin is healthy, it will get rid of  dead skin cells up and out through the skin pores (in other words, it exfoliates itself and regenerates the new skin).</p><p>Still, there's a whole multitude of chemical products that will dehydrate your skin (ie. not enough water left in the skin layers). As your skin is dehydrated, it will begin to trap those dead skin cells and the chemical junk leftover in makeups and other skin care products into your pores.</p><p> </p><h4><span style="color: #006899;">Extreme skin sensitivity</span></h4><p>Clogged Pores, Sensitive Red Skin, Rosacea are all the telling signs that your skin health suffers from an extreme sensitivity...</p><p>The chemicals included in it, can act to heighten an increase in skin's sensitivity, as well as it can thin your skin and remove the protective barrier. This means that the skin and pores become too responsive towards what you're applying on it.</p><p>If that's true, the skin will be responding actively to even the slightest external stimulation... That kind of reaction starts sending more blood flow to the area, making your face red and blotchy, resulting in some bright long lasting hyper-pigmentation marks, increased acne, etc.</p><p> </p><h4><span style="color: #006899;">Trapped skin pores inflammation</span></h4><p>The blood flow, which usually follows even the slightest skin stimulation then gets trapped within the pore. Those pores, in turn, get clogged with dead skin cells, oil, and chemical ingredients, which will simply stagnate there.</p><p>This blood flow stagnation scars the natural collagen in the pore (collagen being our skin’s supportive and regenerative component), so the scar tissue will die and get clogged inside the pore alongside the dead skin cells.</p><p>This results in scarring, pitting, big pores, and lots of redness and breakouts. If you can't yet spot that scarring on the surface now, if left unfixed it will inevitably become more visible over time.</p><p>And if the pressure in the skin's pores gets too high, it will become full on inflammation, rupture the pore and spread to the next pore, spreading the problem across your skin.</p><h6><strong>Okay so let’s get to the ingredients oftentimes used in the skin care products, that you may want to be avoiding:</strong></h6><p> </p><h5><span style="color: #006899;">Silicones</span></h5><p><strong>Names:</strong></p><p>Methicone, dimethicone, trimethicone, cyclomethicone, siloxane, cyclopentasiloxane, cyclotetrasiloxane, cyclohexasiloxane, silsesquioxane, trimethylsiloxysilicate, methylpolysiloxane, stearoxytrimethylsilane</p><p><strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong></p><p>Add a silky and smooth touch...</p><p><strong>What they actually do:</strong></p><p>Apparently silicones are one of the most harmful ingredients out there. They contribute to dehydrating the skin and clogging the pores, which oftentimes marks the beginning of redness, pore scarring, and acne breakouts.</p><p> </p><h5><span style="color: #006899;">Petrochemicals</span></h5><p><strong>Names:</strong></p><p>Paraffin wax, mineral oil, toluene, benzene, petrolatum, and anything that ends in “eth”, “decane”, or contains the words PEG (polyethylene glycol), DEA (diethanolamine), MEA (ethanolamine), TEA (triethanolamine), butyl, methyl, propyl, ethyl, ethanol</p><p><strong>Examples:</strong></p><p>propylene glycol, PEG-40, laureth sulfate, phenoxyethanol, butylene glycol or butyl stearate, EDTA (ethylene-diamine-tetracetatic acid), isopropyl alcohol, methylparaben, ceteareth-20, BHA (butylated hydroxyanisole), BHT (butylated hydroxytoluene), dodecane</p><p><strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong></p><p>It usually either locks the moisture in the skin pores, keeping it moisturized or acts as a skin preservative in any other relevant way...</p><p><strong>What they actually do:</strong></p><p>Petroleum derived ingredients are pore clogging components, which work as a delivery agent, meaning they trap all other junk in the product deeper into the pores. Sometimes they may come with such hazardous ingredients as the 1,4-dioxane, a carcinogen and neurotoxin...</p><p> </p><h5><span style="color: #006899;">Parabens</span></h5><p><strong>Names:</strong></p><p>acnemethylparaben, propylparaben, ethylparaben, butylparaben</p><p><strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong></p><p>Supposedly they make the mold growth stop and also extend the shelf life of the product...</p><p><strong>What they actually do:</strong></p><p>All of these are highly toxic and are harmful to your endocrine system. In other words, those are hormone messer uppers. When you are trying to heal from acne, you don’t want that.</p><p> </p><h5><span style="color: #006899;">Phthalates</span></h5><p><strong>Names:</strong></p><p>pthalatesDEP (diethyl phthalate), DBP (di-n-butyl phthalate), BzBP (benzylbutyl phthalate)</p><p><strong>What they are supposed to do:</strong></p><p>Usually, those ingredients are meant to homogenize the product and dissolve solid ingredients. Also used to make the fragrance stay...</p><p><strong>What they actually do:</strong></p><p>Same as parabens… they disrupt your hormones and mess the hormone system up...</p><p> </p><p>To summarize, it's important to keep in mind that when you look up for your skin care product's contents, the ingredients are enlisted with the highest quantity first. They go down the list in a descending order (from more to less)...</p><p>So the first ingredient listed is the main ingredient with the highest quantity of the product.</p><p>If you come across a “baddie” ingredient it’s going to be less of a big deal if it’s at the end of the list (ex. 0.05% of the whole product), rather than if it’s close to the top (ex. 50% of the whole product).</p></div><p>[/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section]</p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
